definition: this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
to walk (side part of split character)
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this

sentences.english: This rule nullifies the "little brother" argument.
sentences.chinese: 这条规则否定的“小兄弟”的论点。

sentences.english: This gave the Chinese people a better sense of balance in regard to this-worldlincss and other- worldliness .
sentences.chinese: 这使得中国人对于入世和出世具有良好的平衡感。

sentences.english: Even as Abraham believed God, and it was accounted to him for righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 正如，亚伯拉罕信神，这就算为他的义。

sentences.english: And you express that "I'm feeling this way, is it ok?"
sentences.chinese: 你可以表达“我有这样子的感觉，没问题吧？”

sentences.english: Both men had direct contact with dead chickens when feeding carcasses to their dogs.
sentences.chinese: 这两名男子均在将死鸡尸体喂狗时直接接触了死鸡。

sentences.english: The couple arrived at a plain first.
sentences.chinese: 这对夫妇先来到一个平原。

sentences.english: It is not just about assuaging your conscience.
sentences.chinese: 这不仅是有关平息你的良心。

sentences.english: This article mainly introduces an improved system of mate-grinding servo valve.
sentences.chinese: 文章介绍了经这改进的伺服阀气动配磨系统。

sentences.english: I was baffled that some ofthe most basic workplace blunders seem to be tripping people up!
sentences.chinese: 许多最基本的职场失误会让他们摔跟头，这让我困惑。

sentences.english: Therefore the algorithm can effectively control the bandwidth occupation of non-response flow.
sentences.chinese: 这将有效的控制非响应流对带宽的占用。

sentences.english: Rather he'll say, "It's for the child's own good.
sentences.chinese: 而是说，“这都是为了孩子好。

sentences.english: Jane Zhang did a cover of this song during her performance at Super Girl.
sentences.chinese: 张靓颖在超级女声的比赛中表演过这首歌。

sentences.english: It's part of the job description. - …
None of this will actually be decided at Bali.
sentences.chinese: 所有这一切实际上都决定在巴里岛。

sentences.english: Of these four things , the first is your legal due.
sentences.chinese: 这四种中的第一件是你法律上应享的权力。

sentences.english: I seldom oppose Israel and Israeli teams these days.
sentences.chinese: 我很少反对以色列和以色列队这几天。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
